amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-42 to prevent the President from using the plan mandated in this act to preclude states or cities from taking more ambitious actions to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Torres (CA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
